We need to inspect the bakery for sanitation.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: niHtaaj infatish al maKhbaz lil woqaaya iS SaHeeya

We need to inspect the dairy plant.
We need to inspect the poultry plant.

‘idnaa ‘ajez: mita aaKhir mara itlaqaHat haay il Haywaanaat?
عدنا عجز: متى آخر مرة تلقحت هاي الحيوانات؟

Do they need to be vaccinated?

‘idnaa ‘ajez: haThaa il akel Kharbaan, min faDhlak laa taakla
عدنا عجز: هذا الأكل خربان، من فضلك لا تاكله

‘idnaa ‘ajez: il maHaaSeel mit- athera bil Hasharaat?

Are the animals infected with parasites?

‘idnaa ‘ajez: Haawil itjaawub ‘ala as- iltee ib “ee” aw “laa”
عدنا عجز: حاول إتجاوب على أسئِلتي بـ “إي” أو “لا”

Move your head like this for “yes.”
Move your head like this for “no.”
Do you know where you are?
We will try to contact someone from your group.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: raH inHaawil nitiSil ibwaaHid min jamaa’tak
عدنا عجز: رَح نحاوِل نِتّصل بواحد من جَماعتَك

I will talk with you again.
Hold up the number of fingers.

I am here to help you.
What country were you born in?

Do you have any allergies to medicines?

Do you have high blood pressure problems?
Do you have blood sugar control problems?
We will take care of you.
We will try not to hurt you further.
Show me where it hurts worst.
When did you have your last meal?

We need to take you to surgery.
If we do not operate, you may die.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iThaa maa insaweelak haay il ‘amaleeya, iHtimaal itmoot
عدنا عجز: إذا ما نسَوّيلك هاي العَمَلِيّة ، إحتِمال تموت

If we do not operate, you may lose this.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iThaa maa insaweelak haay il ‘amaleeya, raH tiKhsar haThaa
عدنا عجز: إذا ما نسَوّيلك هاي العَمَلِيّة ، رَح تخسر هذا

‘idnaa ‘ajez: il ‘amaleeya KhaTra, bas hiya il Tareeqa il waHeeda ilee raH itsaa’dak
عدنا عجز: العَمَلِيّة خَطرَة، بَس هيّ الطريقَة الوحيدَة إللي رح تساعدك

Do you understand that you need this surgery?
‘idnaa ‘ajez: tifham inta miHtaaj il haay il ‘amaleeya?

عدنا عجز: كُلّش رَح ندير بالنا عليك بالعَمَلِيّة

We want your permission before we operate on you.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: niHtaaj muwaafaqtak gabul maa insawee il ‘amaleeya
عدنا عجز: نِحتاج مُوافَقتَك گَبل ما نسَوّي العَمَلِيّة

This medicine will make you sleep.
Do you have any allergies, especially to medications?
Do you have high blood pressure / diabetes or blood sugar control problems?
‘idnaa ‘ajez: ‘indak mashaakil wiyaa DhagheT id dam aw wiyaa il sukar womaa tigdar itsayTer ‘alayha?
عدنا عجز: عندك مشاكل ويا ضغط الدم أو ويا السُكر وما تگدر تسيطر عليها؟

We are all working to help you.
Help us take care of you.
We have to remove your clothes.
Do you have any bad reactions to any medicine?

‘idnaa ‘ajez: haThaa il jareH min wara lughum?

Is this from a vehicle crash?
Did a person do this to you?
‘idnaa ‘ajez: minoo sawa beek haThaa il shey?

Did you lose consciousness after this happened?
‘idnaa ‘ajez: ghama ‘alayk ba’ad maa Saar hal shey?
عدنا عجز: غمى عليك بعد ما صار هالشي؟

Did you lose more than this much blood?
‘idnaa ‘ajez: Tila’ min nak dam akthar min haay al kameeya?
عدنا عجز: طلع منك دم أكثر من هاي الكمية؟

Point to all the parts of your body that hurt.
Does it hurt when I do this?
Did you inhale any smoke or very hot air?
I have to put a small needle in you here.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: laazim a’Teek ibra izgheera min naa

We need to give you fluid.
We need to give you blood.
I need to put a tube into your throat.
This tube will help you breathe better.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: haThaa il inboob raH yisaa’dak titnafas zayn
عدنا عجز: هذا الإنبوب رَح يساعدك تتنفّس زين

‘idnaa ‘ajez: haThaa il inboob yimkin raH yiDhaygak

I need to put a tube through your nose to your stomach.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: raH aKhalee inboob min Khashmak il ma’idtak
عدنا عجز: رَح أخلّي إنبوب من خشمَك إلمِعِدتَك

‘idnaa ‘ajez: ibla’ min aKhalee haThaa il inboob ibKhashmak
عدنا عجز: إبلع من أخلّي هذا الإنبوب بخشمَك

Drink this while I gently place the tube into your nose.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: ishrab min haThaa laman aKhalee il inboob ibKhashmak
عدنا عجز: إشرَب من هذا لمن أخلّي الإنبوب بخشمَك

This tube will drain your stomach.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: haThaa il inboob raH yifarigh ma’ditak

I have to put a small tube into your neck to give you fluid.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: raH aKhalee inboob izgheer ibrugubtak Hata a’Teek sawaa-il
عدنا عجز: رَح أخلّي إنبوب زغير برگُبتَك حتى أِعِطيك سوائل

I need to put a tube in your chest.
This needle will release the air from your chest.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: haay il ubra raH itfarigh il hawa min Sadrak
عدنا عجز: هاي الأبرة رح تفرّغ الهوا من صدرك

I need to cut your skin.
We have to restrain you for your safety.
You have been burned by a chemical.
We need to wash the chemicals from your skin.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: laazim nighsil haay il mawaad al keemyaawiya min jildak
عدنا عجز: لازم نِغسل هاي المواد الكيمياوية من جلدك

You will need to be completely washed.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: laazim tighsil min fog lee jawa

Hold this dressing and apply pressure.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: ilzam haThaa il lafaaf wo iDhghaT ‘aleeh

I need to splint your arm.
I need to splint your leg.
I am applying a tourniquet to stop the bleeding.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: anaa laazim aKhalee al DhaagheTa Hata itwaguf al nazeef
عدنا عجز: آنا لازم أخلي الضاغطة حتى توگف النزيف

Do you have problems starting to urinate?
Do you have an urge to urinate but are unable to pass urine?
‘idnaa ‘ajez: itHis itreed itbool bas maa tigdar itbool?
عدنا عجز: تحس إتريد إتبول بس ما تگدر إتبول؟

Do you have any pain with urination?
‘idnaa ‘ajez: tish’ur ib ay wija’ min itbool?

You need a tube in your bladder.
I am going to insert a tube into your bladder to drain urine.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: raH adaKhil inboob ib mathantak Hata infarigh il bol
عدنا عجز: رَح أدخّل إنبوب بمثانتَك حتّى نفرّغ البول

‘idnaa ‘ajez: haThaa il inboob raH yifarigh il bol min mathantak
عدنا عجز: هذا الإنبوب رَح يفرّغ البول من مثانتَك

This tube will feel uncomfortable in you.
Do not eat or drink until the surgery.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: laa takil wala tishrab gabul il ‘amaleeya
عدنا عجز: لا تاكل ولا تِشرَب گبل العمليَة

‘idnaa ‘ajez: laa takil wala tishrab ay shee wara nuS il layl
عدنا عجز: لا تاكل ولا تِشرَب أي شي وَرَه نص الليل

You must stay in this room.

You may get up to go to the toilet.
We cannot give you anything to eat or drink.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: maa nigdar ni’Teek laa akel wala shurub

عدنا عجز: من تسوي عَمَلِيّة، لازِم مِعِدْتَك تكون فارغَة

‘idnaa ‘ajez: raH ni’Teek akel wo shurub awal matSeer zayn
عدنا عجز: رَح نِعطيك أكِل وشُرُب أوَل مَتصير زين

Does anything make the pain better?

عدنا عجز: صار لك كم وهذا الوِجَع عندك؟

Describe the pain on a scale from 1 to 10.

Hold up the number of fingers.

‘idnaa ‘ajez: shinoo heya il mushkila il ra-eeseeya?

Is this the worst pain you ever had?
Is there anything that relieves the pain symptom?

عدنا عجز: أكو عندك أي شي يخفف أعراض الوجع؟

The bone is not broken here.

‘idnaa ‘ajez: laazim naKhThak il ghurfat il ‘amaliyaat Hata yesawoolak ‘amaleeya
عدنا عجز: لازم ناخذك لغرفة العمليّات حتى يسوولك عملية

Does the vaginal bleeding come and go?

We will protect your privacy as much as we can.

عدنا عجز: رَح نحافظ على خصوصيتِچ على گدر ما نگدر

Push now as hard as you can.

You need to let us keep your child here.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: laazim tismaHeelna inKhalee Tiflich min naa

Your child will get better soon.

عدنا عجز: طِفلِچ رَح يِصير زين بوقت قصير

This medicine will help your child.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: haThaa al duwa raH yisaa’id Tiflich

Has your child passed urine today?
Has your child passed any stool today?
Did your child pass any stool yesterday?
Has your child had any diarrhea?
Your child will be ill for a long time.

‘idnaa ‘ajez: il maraDh raH yirooH ishwaya ishwaya, bas SiHat Tiflich raH titHassan tamaman
عدنا عجز: المرَض رَح يروح شوية شوية، بَس صحّة طِفلِچ رَح تِتحَسّن تماماً

‘idnaa ‘ajez: waklee Tiflich wajbaat qaleela kul cham saa’a

Bring your child back here tomorrow.
Bring your child back if there is no improvement by tomorrow.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: jeebeelna Tiflich baachir iThaa maa Saar zayn
عدنا عجز: جيبيلنا طِفلِچ باچِر إذا ما صار زين

We will continue to follow the health of your child with you.

‘idnaa ‘ajez: haaThee il Habaaya maal il galub yimkin itsawee ‘indak wija’ raas
عدنا عجز: هاذي الحَبايّة مال الگَلب يمكِن تسَوّي عِندَك وِجَع راس

This will go under your tongue.
Let us take care of you.

Which eye has a new problem?

عدنا عجز: إبقى مرَكّز على ذاك الشي، مِن أباوع بعيونَك

Hold very still while I remove the foreign body in your eye.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: laa titHarak min aTali’ haThaa ish shay min ‘aynak
عدنا عجز: لا تتحَرّك من أطلّع هذا الشي مِن عينَك

‘idnaa ‘ajez: Saar lak cham yom wo inta Dha’eef?
عدنا عجز: صار لَك چَم يوم وإنت ضعيف؟

Cough some phlegm into this cup.
Look at my finger as it moves.
Take a deep breath in and out.
Touch my finger with this finger.
Touch your finger to your nose like this.
You need an X-ray of your chest.
Can I do anything to help you?
I will try not to hurt you.
I am going to lift you.
I am going to put a needle in your arm to give you medication.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: raH aKhalee ibra biThraa’ak Hata a’Teek duwa
عدنا عجز: رَح أخلّي إبرة بذراعَك حتى أعطيك دوا

I am sorry I hurt you.
I must adjust the tube in your chest.
I must give you a shave.
I must give you a suppository into your rectum.

Put your arms around my shoulders.
This medicine will take the pain away.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: haThaa id duwa yewaKher il wija’

This will help you feel better.
Everything will be done to make you feel better again.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: raH inHaawil insawee kul shay Hata itSeer zayn
عدنا عجز: رَح نحاول نسوي كل شي حتى تصير زين

You will soon be up again.
Your condition is serious, but you will get better.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: Haaltak KhaTra, bas raH itSeer zayn
عدنا عجز: حالتَك خطرة، بس رَح تصير زين

You will get better if you let us take care of you.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iThaa itKhaleena in’aaljak raH itSeer zayn
عدنا عجز: إذا تخلينا نعالجك رح تصير زين

‘idnaa ‘ajez: tiHtaaj wakit Taweel Hata itSeer zayn
عدنا عجز: تِحتاج وَكت طويل حتى تصير زين

We tried, but we could not save this
‘idnaa ‘ajez: Haawelna, bas maa gedarna inbaqee haThaa
عدنا عجز: حاولنا، بَس ما گدرنا نبقي هذا

You will need time to heal.
We will arrange for your transport back to your country.

You will return to your unit when you are better.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: raH tirja’ il waHedtak laman itSeer zayn
عدنا عجز: رَح ترَجع لوِحِدتَك لمِن تصير زين

‘idnaa ‘ajez: raH arja’ mara thaaneya Hata ashoofak shlon Sirit
عدنا عجز: رَح أرجع مرّة ثانية حتى أشوفك شلون صرت

‘idnaa ‘ajez: ta’aal baachir Hata nit- akad Sirit zayn
عدنا عجز: تعال باچِر حتى نتأكد صرت زين

Return in one week so we can be sure you get better.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: ta’aal wara isboo’ Hata nit-akad Sirit zayn
عدنا عجز: تعال وره إسبوع حتى نتأكد صرت زين

Do you have any of the following problems?
I need to give you some medicine.

‘idnaa ‘ajez: haThaa il duwa raH yemna’ al iltihaab
itjanab il Khamur min taKhuTh il duwa

Take on an empty stomach (one hour before or two hours after a meal).
‘idnaa ‘ajez: KhuTh il duwa min tikoon baTnak faargha (gabul saa’a lo ba’ad al akel ibsa’teen)
عدنا عجز: خذ الدوا من تكون بطنك فارغة (گبل ساعة لو بعد الأكل بساعتين)

Avoid taking at the same time as dairy products.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: itjaneb taKhuTh ibnafs il waqt mantoojaat al Haleeb
عدنا عجز: إتجنب تاخذ بنفس الوقت منتوجات الحليب

This medicine may change the color of urine or stool.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: haThaa il duwa yemken yeghayir lon al bol aw al Khurooj
عدنا عجز: هذا الدوا يمكن يغير لون البول أو الخروج

May cause drowsiness (avoid using dangerous machinery).
‘idnaa ‘ajez: yemken yesabib doKha (itjanab il ‘amel bil makaayen)
Khalee qaTaraat bil- eThin al muSaaba
iHgin il ibra taHet il jelid

Unwrap and insert one suppository rectally.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iftaH ghilaaf al fateela wa daKhelha bil sharij

Allow to dissolve under tongue without swallowing (sublingual).
‘idnaa ‘ajez: laa tibla’a Khaleeh yeThoob jawa il lisaan
عدنا عجز: لا تبلعه خليه يذوب جوه اللسان

‘idnaa ‘ajez: iz’aaj bil me’da, wo l’baan al nafas, wo zwaa’
noba fujaa-eeya teDhrub ‘ala il galub aw il idmaagh
عدنا عجز: نوبة فجائية تضرب على الگلب أو الدماغ

Apply a thin layer to skin
Do you have any of the following diseases?
‘idnaa ‘ajez: ‘indak ay maraDh min haay il amraaDh?
عدنا عجز: عندك أي مرض من هاي الأمراض؟

How many men are on this ship?
‘idnaa ‘ajez: kam rejaal ako ibhaay is safeena?
wayn il maktab ir ra- eesee?

Do you have weapons of mass destruction?
Do you have weapons of mass destruction?
To which cell do you belong?
Do you have an ID card?
Here is a copy of our ground rules.
Sign here if you agree to follow the ground rules.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: waqi’ minna iThaa itwaafiq ‘ala mutaaba’at shorooTnaa il-asaasiya
عدنا عجز: وقع منا إذا توافق على متابعة شروطنا الأساسية

This is not the public affairs office.
I am not an official spokesperson.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: anaa moo an naaTiq ar rasmee

He does not wish to give an interview.
عدنا عجز: هو ما عنده رغبة يسوي مقابلة

She does not wish to give an interview.
عدنا عجز: هي ما عدها رغبة تسوي مقابلة

‘idnaa ‘ajez: mamnoo’ al taSweer bil veedyo min naa

Do not take photos of this place.
Do not take videos of this place.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: mamnoo’ itSawir hal makaan bil veedyo

Do not take photos of this piece of equipment.
Do not take videos of this piece of equipment.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: laa itSawer haaTha il jihaaz bil veedyo

You cannot enter this area now.
For security reasons, I cannot address this question.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: il-asbaab amniya, maa agdar awajih hal su-aal
عدنا عجز: الأسباب أمنية، ما أگدر أوجه هالسؤال

I cannot address that question until the investigation is finished.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: ma agdar awajih hal su-aal ila an yintihee al taHqeeq
عدنا عجز: ما أگدر أوجه هالسؤال إلى أن ينتهي التحقيق

We do not discuss personnel or equipment strength with the media.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iHna maa naaqish al quwa il bashariya wo quwat al ajhiza wiya il i’laam
عدنا عجز: إحنا ما نّاقش القوة البشرية وقوة الأجهزة ويا الإعلام

We do not discuss future operations with the media.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iHna maa naaqish al ‘amaliyaat al mustaqbaliya wiya il i’laam
عدنا عجز: إحنا ما نّاقش العمليات المستقبلية ويا الإعلام

We do not discuss nuclear operations with the media.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iHna maa naaqish al ‘amaliyaat al nawawiya wiya il i’laam
عدنا عجز: إحنا ما نّاقش العمليات النووية ويا الإعلام

We do not discuss chemical operations with the media.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iHna maa naaqish il ‘amaliyaat il keemyaawiya wiya il i’laam
عدنا عجز: إحنا ما نّاقش العمليات الكيمياوية ويا الإعلام

We do not discuss biological operations with the media.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iHna maa naaqish il ‘amaliyaat il bayolojiya wiya il i’laam
عدنا عجز: إحنا ما نّاقش العمليات البايولوجية ويا الإعلام

We do not have information on this subject.
Names cannot be released until victims’ relatives are notified.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: al asmaa maa tiDh har Hata inKhabur garaayib al DhaHaaya
عدنا عجز: الأسماء ما تظهر حتى نخبر گرايب الضحايا

This is the ___ public affairs office.
This is not the public affairs office.
What media organization do you represent?
What is the subject of this article?
Could you please ask the question in a different way?
‘idnaa ‘ajez: rajaa-an tigdar tis-al su-aalak ib Tareeqa thaaniya?
عدنا عجز: رجاءً تگدر تسأل سؤالك بطريقة ثانية؟

Could you please use simpler language?

‘idnaa ‘ajez: waaHid, ithnayn, tlaatha, arba’a, Khamsa, sita, sab’a, thmaanya, tis’a, ‘ashra
عدنا عجز: واحد، إثنين، تلاثة، أربعة، خمسة، ستة، سبعة، ثمانية، تسعة، عشرة

Please say one number at a time.
A press release on that subject is being prepared.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: at taqreer aS SaHafee ‘ala Thak il mawDhoo’ HaaDhir
عدنا عجز: التقرير الصحفي على ذاك الموضوع حاضر

There will be a press conference on that subject.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: raH yiSeer mo-tamar SaHafee ‘ala al mawDhoo’
عدنا عجز: راح يصير مؤتمر صحفي على الموضوع

Wear this badge where it can be seen.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: Khali baTaqat il isim ib makaan waaDheH

Leave your camera with this person.
Leave your cell phone with this person.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: Khali telefonak al naqal wiya hal shaKhis

Stay within ___ meters of me at all times.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: ibqa Khilaal ___ amtaar minee ibkul il awqaat
عدنا عجز: إبقى خلال ___ أمتار منّي بكل الأوقات

You will ride with me in that vehicle.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: inta raH teejee wiyaaya ibhal sayaara

You will ride with us in this vehicle.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: inta raH tiS’ad wiyaana ibhal sayaara

You will ride with him in that vehicle.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: inta raH tiS’ad wiyaah ibhay il sayaara
عدنا عجز: إنت راح تصعد وياه بهاي السيارة

I do not wish to give an interview.
He does not wish to give an interview.
She does not wish to give an interview.
I am not qualified to answer that question.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: anaa moo mo-ahal ajaawib ‘ala Thaak il su-aal
عدنا عجز: أنا مو مؤهل أجاوب على ذاك السؤال

She is not qualified to answer that question.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: hiya moo mo-ahala itjawib ‘ala Thaak al su- aal
عدنا عجز: هي مو مؤهلة تجاوب على ذاك السؤال

He is not qualified to answer that question.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: huwa moo mo-ahal yijaawib ‘ala Thaak is su-aal
عدنا عجز: هو مو مؤهل يجاوب على ذاك السؤال

He does not want to answer that question.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: huwa maa yereed yijaawib ‘ala Thaak is su-aal
عدنا عجز: هو ما يريد يجاوب على ذاك السؤال

She does not want to answer that question.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: hiya maa treed itjaawib ‘ala Thaak al su-aal
عدنا عجز: هي ما تريد تجاوب على ذاك السؤال

I will not answer this question.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: anaa maa raH ajaawib ‘ala has su-aal
عدنا عجز: آنا ما راح أجاوب على هالسؤال

I have no answer at this time.
I would like to stop this interview.
She would like to stop this interview.
He would like to stop this interview.
Can you please ask the question in simpler language?
‘idnaa ‘ajez: rajaa-an tigdar tis-al su- aalak iblugha as-hal?
عدنا عجز: رجاءً تگدر تسأل سؤالك بلغة أسهل؟

I will call on you to speak.
He will call on you to speak.
She will call on you to speak.
Please ask only one question each time you are called on.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: rajaa-an is-al su-aal waaHid kul mara
عدنا عجز: رجاءً إسأل سؤال واحد كل مرة

You may ask one legitimate follow-up question per turn.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: tigdar tis-al su-aal ma’qool lil mutaaba’a kul mara
عدنا عجز: تگدر تسأل سؤال معقول للمتابعة كل مرة

Please wait for the interpreter to translate your question.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: rajaa-an inTur al mutarjim yitarjim su- aalak

Please wait for the interpreter to translate your answer.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: rajaa-an inTur al mutarjim yitarjim jawaabak

That is a separate question; there may be time to address it later.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: haThaa as su-aal muKhtalif: yemkin yiSeer ‘ana waqit ba’dayn Hata tis-al
عدنا عجز: هذا السؤال مختلف؛ يمكن يصير عنا وقت بعدين حتى تسأل

If he promised you information, be sure to give your contact information to ___.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iThaa wa’adak ibma’loomaat, ibqa bitiSaal wiyaa ___
عدنا عجز: إبقى إذا وعدك بمعلومات، بإتصال ويا ___

If she promised you information, be sure to give your contact information to her.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iThaa hiya wa’datak ibma’loomaat, ibqa bitiSaal wiyaaha
عدنا عجز: إذا هي وعدتك بمعلومات، إبقى بإتصال وياها

If I promised you information, be sure to give your contact information to me.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iThaa anaa wa’adtak ibma’loomaat, ibqa bitiSaal wiyaaya
عدنا عجز: إذا آنا وعدتك بمعلومات، إبقى بإتصال ويايا

Another session will take place later today.
I am not an official spokesperson.
Please wait for the public affairs representative.
I can only tell you what I know.
We are doing everything we can to restore order.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iHna insawee kul shee Hata inHaafiDh ‘ala il waDhi’
عدنا عجز: إحنا نسوي كل شي حتى نحافظ على الوضع

We are doing everything we can to protect lives.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iHna insawee kul shee Hata niHmee Hayaat an naas
عدنا عجز: إحنا نسوي كل شي حتى نحمي حياة الناس

We are doing everything we can to save lives.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iHna insawee kul shee Hata nenquTh Hayaat an naas
عدنا عجز: إحنا نسوي كل شي حتى ننقذ حياة الناس

We are taking this matter very seriously.
Names cannot be released until victims’ relatives are notified.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: al-asmaa matiDh har Hata inKhabur garaayib al DhaHaaya
عدنا عجز: الأسماء ما تظهر حتى نخبر گرايب الضحايا

The official spokesman is expected here soon.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: an naaTiq ar rasmee raH yeejee ba’ad ishwaya
عدنا عجز: الناطق الرسمي راح يجي بعد شويه

We take every report of wrongdoing very seriously.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iHna naKhuTh il taqaareer ‘an kul ‘amal ghalaT ib shekil jidee
عدنا عجز: احنا ناخذ التقارير عن كل عمل غلط بشكل جدي

We have secured the area where the incident occurred.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: iHna amana il manTiqa ilee Saar beeha al Haadith
عدنا عجز: احنا أمّنا المنطقة إللي صار بيها الحادث

I am sorry but you have to wait for the report.
‘idnaa ‘ajez: anaa mit-asif laazim tintiDhir al taqreer
